translations.Your client is not authorized to connect: Your client is not authorised to connect. Please inform the administrator of your client.
translations.The received redirect uri is not accepte: The received redirect uri is not accepted to connect. Please inform the administrator of your client.
translations.Your redirect URL needs to be a full URL: Your redirect URL needs to be a full URL for example: https://yourdomain.com/path
translations.Use Nextcloud as OpenID Connect Identity: Use Nextcloud as OpenID Connect Identity Provider.
translations.With this app you can use Nextcloud as O: With this app you can use Nextcloud as OpenID Connect Identity Provider.
translations.OpenID Connect allows to authenticate at: OpenID Connect allows to authenticate at external services with {instanceName} user accounts.
